title: spectator mode low fps
body: i just noticed today, that the performance got terrible after the hud rework in specator mode. i usually had 70-100 fps. no its hovering between 25 and 30 and is really stuttering. in regular game is still have a good performance. im playing on a mac book pro 13" retina

replies.body: consistantly, even it shows like 30 fps, it still feel like 15-20. i tried to spectate several different games
Does this happen consistently or did it happen in just one instance of spectating?
